title: Master Meow - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Animal Rearing   Beasts   Caring Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Clumsy Love Interests   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Nobles   Outer Space   Pets   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Unconditional Love
author: Fēi Dāo   非刀
description:
It isn’t terrible to transmigrate into the future. What makes it awful is to transmigrate into a future world without human existence. What is more terrible is to be sold as a rare pet to an extremely large noble cat.

Since then, Lu Qiu begins to be a pet of a cat.

The star network live broadcast platform suddenly adds a lively pet live broadcast. The palm sized human lives in a small house, wears small dress, can organize and cooks, cuts hair, and keeps the master in good order.

The audiences watch their pets lying next to them crying and weeping. “Why are other people's pets so good?!”

Wells is lying on the ground lazily enjoying his pet's petting. Why it’s seemed wrong?>
